title: PM praises young policeman for commitment to serving people
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 19 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Thursday praised a young policeman for his commitment to service and saving the life of a person, who fell while trying to board a moving train.
“This is where duty becomes sacred. Admiration for the commitment of the young policeman to serve the people”, Imran Khan said in a twitter post.
t.co/B1xozkj06a
The Prime Minister in his social media post also shared the short video clip of the incident where the young policeman, after seeing a man falling down into the track area, rushed towards the moving train and pulled the man out.
